name: Snailatouille
description:
You took the million dollars and opened a French restaurant of your dreams. But just because you forgot about the snail doesn’t mean he forgot about you.

based on: https://www.reddit.com/r/AskReddit/comments/5ipinn/you_and_a_super_intelligent_s...

Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D

Interact: Left Mouse Button
